actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to liberalize the provisions for payment of educational assistance benefits to certain disabled veterans.

summary.text: Authorizes the payment of educational assistance benefits to disabled veterans who served for a period of less than 18 months of active duty, and who received a medical discharge because of service-connected disabilities. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 1661(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to liberalize the provisions for payment of educational assistance benefits to certain disabled veterans.
